description: AirParrot allows you to wirelessly beam your screen or media files to a variety of media receivers. AirParrot quickly discovers available receivers on your network, and uses Quick Connect® to connect directly to a device running Reflector 2™. Easily share your screen, videos, audio, presentations and so much more.
summary: Mirror and stream from Windows computers, Macs or Chromebooks to Apple TV, AirPlay-enabled speakers, Chromecast and more. Wirelessly connect your computer to any TV or computer and stream movies, photos or music!
author: Squirrels,  LLC.
